reviews.review: aBER NUR MIT FREUNDEN SONST NEGATIV

This game is definitely worth your time, don't get too attached, it is full of hackers and toxic players, once you learn how to deal with them, it's a fun game! All the one star reviews are 5 yr olds who played in 2016 and 2012, but the updates have made it much better, they nerfed a few things, made the snipers not as OP, and it's easier to hit, once you unlock competitive, I suggest that's what you do the most out of every mode, you could play war games to kill time, but casual you should stay away.


Edited Thoughts: It's been a year or two since i wrote this review, I think overall some of this has definitely changed. For example you should play casual more often than you think, as it helps with spray control and angles. Competitive shouldn't be played too much due to Broken Fang Premier, where the queueing is really messed up. But overall I don't think you should play too much casual. Hackers and Toxic Players are hard to ignore, but if you report them they'll either get banned or muted, so you don't have to deal with them. Overall CS:GO is a wonderful game that gets more fun overall no matter what you do.

CSGO is a shining example for how not to do a report system. If you play with griefers, they won't get banned. If you play with cheaters, they won't get banned. If you make a report, it won't get looked at. Nobody will examine your report.
